basic_info.name: FR. C. Rodrigues Institute of Technology FAQs

Section.name: About FCRIT
Section.description:
FR. C. Rodrigues Institute of Technology (FCRIT), Navi Mumbai was established in 1994 in the heart of Navi Mumbai, Vashi, as a part of Agnel Technical Education Complex. FCRIT is affiliated to the Mumbai University and offers five undergraduate engineering programs (Computer, Mechanical, Electronics & Telecommunication, Electrical, and Information Technology) and two postgraduate engineering programs (Mechanical and Electrical Engineering). Admission in the FCRIT is based on CET or JEE Mains entrance exam. The institute has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell who provides 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters are TCS, Cognizant, Shell, Reliance Jio, Tata Power, Jacobs, Media.net, L&T, Endurance and many more.
FCRIT has been accorded accreditation for all the courses by the NBA (UG courses) and by NAAC. Institute has an in house Centre for incubation and business acceleration also known as CIBA which is catalyzed and supported by Department of Science & Technology under the Startup India Action Plan. Prototyping laboratories, workstations and fully furnished rooms are there to inculcate culture of innovation and entrepreneurship in the society. FCRIT is ranked in the band 201-250 by NIRF, ranked 88 among Indiaâ€™s Best colleges by India Today and given AAA+ rating by Careers360.

FCRIT Navi Mumbai has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell which provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The cell also provides internship opportunities to the students. It organizes industrial visits, guest lectures and prepares for the industry and the upcoming interviews. To improve career prospects the institute employs reputed professionals to conduct special training programmes in English Communication, Group Discussion and Personality Development skills.
FCRIT Navi Mumbai Placement Highlights:
Check: FCRIT Navi Mumbai Placement
The faculty at the FCRIT are highly experienced and well qualified. FCRIT has the faculties for all the specializations of Engineering and Technology. They provide proper guidance to the students through their experience. They are helpful and supportive and have proper understanding in their area of expertise. The faculty comprises of:
Check: FCRIT Navi Mumbai Faculty
Ques. Does FCRIT provide hostel facilities?
Ans. Yes, FCRIT provides separate accommodations for boys and girls. There are air conditioned and non-air conditioned classrooms. The hostels have a capacity of 800 students. The hostel has a mess facility which provides homely food.
Check: FCRIT Navi Mumbai Hostel
Ques. Can I be employed during my course at FCRIT?
Ans. No. FCRIT offers full-time degree and diploma courses. The candidates will not be able to have part-time jobs.
Ques. Does FCRIT offer lateral entry courses?
Ans. Yes, a candidate can directly join the B.Tech and Diploma course directly in 2nd year. Tabulated below are the details for the same:
Ques. Is FCRIT a good college to pursue M. Tech?
Ans. FCRIT is a really good college to pursue M.Tech. The Institute provides world class infrastructure and experienced faculty. The college has laboratories and has an impressive placement record. Therefore, for anyone who wants to pursue BCA, FCRIT is a great option.
Ques. Does FCRIT Navi Mumbai provide scholarships?
Ans. Yes, FCRIT provides scholarships to the students based on their merit and need.
